text: Just get a second apartment for the weekdays. You can probably get a studio for $8,000/month.

elements.text: Just get a second apartment for the weekdays. You can probably get a studio for $8,000/month.

text: yeaaaa I doubt they'll be paying me enough for that. But I have met people who are doing that, but they are also people who would like blow my salary in a 2 week vacation or something
